summary:
This mod basically allows the Nightingale Armour & Weapons to use the Daedric smithing perk, giving you a bonus to the tempering.
You will still however need to use the Void Salts or Ebony Ingots when tempering and not a Daedric heart.
descriptionHtml:
I have done some minor testing and it did appear to work fine, but if there are any problems do tell me and I\'ll see if I can fix them.

This is a suggested mod. So if anyone has any more ideas, don\'t hesitate to ask.
author: orangemark
